article:
Mary was happy to take a seat in the plane. Then  _  air hostess  came up to her and asked, "Can you change your  _ ? A man would like to sit with his wife." The only available seat in the plane was next to a boy  _  his arms broken, a black-and-blue face, and a sad expression . "It's  _  to sit there," Mary thought at first. But a quiet voice from her heart said, "He  _  help." Finally, Mary  _  to that seat.
The boy  _  David had been in a car accident and was on his way to another  _ . When the snacks and juice arrived, Mary found that he could eat  _ food by himself. Mary wanted to feed him  _  hesitated , because it didn't seem proper.
But then Mary believed that helping others was more  _ . She started to help him eat. Although David was uncomfortable to accept , he  _ . They became  closer and closer in a short time.  _  the five-hour trip, Mary felt glad to sit next to David and help him.
When we reach out our hands  to help  others, we get to live in a bigger and more loving world.
